name: YOU make the game
description:
Hello! This is a game I developed for the 2018 Meta Game Jam!

Read Bellow for some basic things to understand if your stuck.

|

-if your on the control screen and trying to combine items but a red X  keeps apearing that means that those two items are too close together (try spacing them out a bit)

-if at anytime the game feels frozen just press space and that will hopefully fix it.

Thanks for playing!
